message.content: Create a pretty visualization showing the current status of all 8 nix-shell nodes, their completion status, and progress metrics. Use ASCII art and show parallel execution tree structure.

content.text: I'll create a visualization showing the status of your 8 nix-shell nodes with their parallel execution tree structure.

input.command: ps aux | grep -E "nix-shell|bash.*test-perplexity" | grep -v grep | wc -l

content.content: This Bash command contains multiple operations. The following part requires approval: find /tmp -maxdepth 1 -name "test-perplexity-*" -type d 2 > /dev/null

toolUseResult: Error: This Bash command contains multiple operations. The following part requires approval: find /tmp -maxdepth 1 -name "test-perplexity-*" -type d 2 > /dev/null

content.content: This Bash command contains multiple operations. The following part requires approval: ls /tmp

toolUseResult: Error: This Bash command contains multiple operations. The following part requires approval: ls /tmp

content.content: This Bash command contains multiple operations. The following part requires approval: ls /tmp/test-perplexity-* 2 > /dev/null

toolUseResult: Error: This Bash command contains multiple operations. The following part requires approval: ls /tmp/test-perplexity-* 2 > /dev/null

content.text: Let me check the processes and create a visualization:

input.command: ps aux | grep nix-shell | grep -v grep

content.content:

a         150897  0.0  0.0   8968  4200 ?        Ss   02:05   0:00 /run/current-system/sw/bin/zsh -c -l source /home/a/.claude/shell-snapshots/snapshot-zsh-1758067955306-zrkbrp.sh && eval "nix-shell -p figlet boxes --run \"claude-code 'Create a pretty visualization showing the current status of all 8 nix-shell nodes, their completion status, and progress metrics. Use ASCII art and show parallel execution tree structure.'\"" \< /dev/null && pwd -P >| /tmp/claude-0220-cwd
a         150898  1.7  0.0   8728  5016 ?        S    02:05   0:00 bash /tmp/nix-shell-150898-0/rc
